document.full_text: chicago bulls guard derrick rose ended lebron james's two-year reign as the nba's most valuable player on tuesday when he became the youngest winner of the sport's highest individual honor.
document.title: bulls' rose becomes nba's youngest mvp winner
lines_and_colors: chicago bulls guard derrick rose ended lebron james's two-year reign as the nba's most valuable player on tuesday when he became the youngest winner of the sport's highest individual honor.
